Sun ONE Directory Server The Sun ONE Directory Server (formerly iPlanet Directory Server) offers a central repository for storing and managing identity profiles, access privileges, and application and network resource information. Information stored in the Sun ONE Directory Server can be used to provide services such as authentication, authorization, access management, and single signon to the users
